You can use some features but it's impossible to save the work since it cant LogIn. So it's uselees

Hoping that offline registration will work I purchased a monthly plan but CSP doesn't issue license keys unless you buy perpetual version. Even then, it seems it doeasn't work without the ability to connect to CSP's servers.

The installer itself works nice but unfortunatelly the program itself appently cannot be used with wine anymore.
summary: CSP seems impossible to use on linux anymore

description: si se instala y funciona y todo pero ¿que version maneja?

J'ai beau m'inscrire correctement, le logiciel considère soit disant que mon mot de passe est faux...

Je ne peux donc pas enregistrer ce que je pourrais éventuellement faire dedans...

Si vous savez comment régler le probème, çaserait bien...
summary: je ne recommande pas du tout...
